name: Feather Token (Tree)
desc: This token can be activated only on an unoccupied patch of earth or soil. When activated, this token transforms into an oak tree, 60 feet tall with a 5-foot-wide trunk. The tree continues to live and grow if conditions are favorable.

name: Candle of Truth
desc:
This tapered candle has a golden wick that burns with white fire. You activate the candle by lighting it, which causes creatures within 10 feet of the candle to find it difficult to tell falsehoods. Creatures in the area receive a -4 status penalty to Lie.

In addition, when first entering the affected area, each creature (including you) must succeed at a DC 26 Will save or be unable to tell any deliberate lies while within 10 feet of the lit candle. This lasts for as long as the candle is lit. Once lit, the candle burns for 10 minutes, and it cannot be extinguished.

name: Dust of Disappearance
desc: This powder shimmers like a thousand tiny motes of light. Activating the dust by sprinkling it on yourself or a creature within reach casts a 4th-level invisibility spell with a duration of 1 minute on that creature. This invisibility canâ€™t be negated or seen through by any spell of 3rd level or lower or any item of 5th level or lower.

name: Elemental Gem (Transparent)
desc:
You shout the name of an elemental lord and dash this glassy gem against a hard surface to activate it. It cracks open, casting a 5th-level summon elemental spell to summon forth an elemental you control as long as you spend an action each round to Sustain the Activation.

This gem comes in four varieties: transparent for a living whirlwind, light brown for a living landslide, reddish orange for a living wildfire, and blue-green for a living waterfall.
subTypeDesc: A transparent elemental gem summons a living whirlwind.

name: Elemental Gem (Light Brown)
desc:
You shout the name of an elemental lord and dash this glassy gem against a hard surface to activate it. It cracks open, casting a 5th-level summon elemental spell to summon forth an elemental you control as long as you spend an action each round to Sustain the Activation.

This gem comes in four varieties: transparent for a living whirlwind, light brown for a living landslide, reddish orange for a living wildfire, and blue-green for a living waterfall.
subTypeDesc: A light brown elemental gem summons a living landslide.

name: Elemental Gem (Reddish Orange)
desc:
You shout the name of an elemental lord and dash this glassy gem against a hard surface to activate it. It cracks open, casting a 5th-level summon elemental spell to summon forth an elemental you control as long as you spend an action each round to Sustain the Activation.

This gem comes in four varieties: transparent for a living whirlwind, light brown for a living landslide, reddish orange for a living wildfire, and blue-green for a living waterfall.
subTypeDesc: A reddish orange elemental gem summons a living wildfire.

name: Feather Token (Whip)
desc: This feather transforms into a +1 striking dancing whip when activated. The whip immediately jumps from your grasp and proceeds to attack your enemies until 1 minute has passed or it fails its flat check for dancing, at which point it vanishes. If the whip's target isn't prone, the whip uses its actions to attempt to Trip that creature instead of making a Strike. The whip's total attack modifier for Striking or Tripping is +18 instead of the normal bonus for a dancing weapon.

name: Elemental Gem (blue-green)
desc:
You shout the name of an elemental lord and dash this glassy gem against a hard surface to activate it. It cracks open, casting a 5th-level summon elemental spell to summon forth an elemental you control as long as you spend an action each round to Sustain the Activation.

This gem comes in four varieties: transparent for a living whirlwind, light brown for a living landslide, reddish orange for a living wildfire, and blue-green for a living waterfall.
subTypeDesc: A blue-green elemental gem summons a living waterfall.

name: Berry Tart (Knapsack of Halflingkind)
desc: The knapsack of halflingkind contains berry tarts wrapped in parchment paper. A creature can unwrap and eat one tart with an Interact action to regain |dice=2d8+4| 2d8+4 Hit Points. The knapsack produces four tarts per day, which appear at breakfast time. Any tarts not eaten by the end of the day evaporate.

name: Berry Tart (Knapsack of Halflingkind (Greater))
desc: The greater knapsack of halflingkind contains berry tarts wrapped in parchment paper. A creature can unwrap and eat one tart with an Interact action to regain |dice=4d8+8| 4d8+8 Hit Points. The knapsack produces four tarts per day, which appear at breakfast time. Any tarts not eaten by the end of the day evaporate.
subTypeDesc: The berry tarts each restore 4d8+8 Hit Points.

name: Fire Seed (6th Level)
desc:
This acorn's shell is streaked with pulsing red and orange patterns. You can toss it up to 30 feet with an Interact action. It explodes in a 5-foot burst, dealing |dice=4d6 Fire| 4d6 fire damage. The save uses the caster's spell DC, even if someone else throws the acorn.

Flames continue to burn on the ground in the burst for 1 minute, dealing |dice=2d6 Fire| 2d6 fire damage to any creature that enters the flames or ends its turn within them. A creature can take damage from the continuing flames only once per round, even if it's in overlapping areas of fire created by different acorns.

When the spell ends, any remaining acorns rot and turn to ordinary soil.

name: Fire Seed (8th Level)
desc:
This acorn's shell is streaked with pulsing red and orange patterns. You can toss it up to 30 feet with an Interact action. It explodes in a 5-foot burst, dealing |dice=5d6 Fire| 5d6 fire damage. The save uses the caster's spell DC, even if someone else throws the acorn.

Flames continue to burn on the ground in the burst for 1 minute, dealing |dice=3d6 Fire| 3d6 fire damage to any creature that enters the flames or ends its turn within them. A creature can take damage from the continuing flames only once per round, even if it's in overlapping areas of fire created by different acorns.

When the spell ends, any remaining acorns rot and turn to ordinary soil.
subTypeDesc: The burst's damage increases to 5d6, and the continuing flames damage increases to 3d6.

name: Fire Seed (9th Level)
desc:
This acorn's shell is streaked with pulsing red and orange patterns. You can toss it up to 30 feet with an Interact action. It explodes in a 5-foot burst, dealing |dice=6d6 Fire| 6d6 fire damage. The save uses the caster's spell DC, even if someone else throws the acorn.

Flames continue to burn on the ground in the burst for 1 minute, dealing |dice=3d6 Fire| 3d6 fire damage to any creature that enters the flames or ends its turn within them. A creature can take damage from the continuing flames only once per round, even if it's in overlapping areas of fire created by different acorns.

When the spell ends, any remaining acorns rot and turn to ordinary soil.
subTypeDesc: The burst's damage increases to 6d6, and the continuing flames damage increases to 3d6.
